start.text: I am the one with the gun.
There is only honor in battle.

start_boss.text: I've been looking forward to this.
There is nothing you possess that we cannot take away.

retreat.text: Tactics. I use them to my advantage.

out_of_missiles.text: I have need of your matter.

engaged.text: I will bring the battle to them.
It will not live for another day.

need_help.text: That is something I cannot allow to happen.

pursuing.text: Feel honored I have chosen you.

hull_50.text: My damage is growing, but so is my anger!
This is more than a flesh wound!

hull_30.text: My damage has reached critical levels.

overload.text: Put the cattle down, and back away, slowly.

victory.text: Perhaps you are too frightened to engage me!
Curse me in vain as you breathe your last!
